roleset.name: to draw something in by or as if by suction
roleset.note: SUCK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'suck' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from suck.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: source, entity that arg1 is sucked from

example.name: suck-v: transitive
example.text: After [*-2] clanging around for an hour or so , the shiny , hot money pours out of the cement chute , where a giant vacuum sucks away the dried mud and burnt wrappers [*T*-1].
example.arg: the dried mud and burnt wrappers

example.name: suck-v: With Arg 2
example.text: We may have already sucked much of the juice out of that orange.

roleset.name: be bad (at)
roleset.note: SUCK-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from suck.03-v)

example.name: suck-v: Just arg0
example.text: Totally allowable in an open primary , but it sucks nonetheless .

example.name: suck-v: Both args
example.text: The US Sucks at Olympic Lifting.

roleset.name: suck_up: deal with an unpleasant or undesireable situation
roleset.note: SUCK_UP-V NOTES: predicate added by Arrick (from suck.02-v)

role.descr: one who must endure the situation

example.name: suck_up-v: transitive
example.text: ...[the prosecutors]-1 have *-1 to just suck it up and be depressed

roleset.name: brown-nose
roleset.note: SUCK_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from suck.04-v)

example.name: suck_up-v: with PRP
example.text: they passed a bill , and Christie the Hutt decides he 's stull sucking up to be RomBot 's running mate .

roleset.name: suction
roleset.note: SUCTION-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin (from suction.01-v)

example.name: suction-v: from Google
example.text: She suctioned her breathing passages and turned up the oxygen flow to the incubator.

example.name: suction-n: All args
example.text: It is to be noted that this excess air is caused by their suction of milk from their feeding bottles with over-used nipples.
example.arg: from their feeding bottles with over-used nipples
